metadata.title: CVE-2018-4022 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: A use-after-free vulnerability exists in the way MKVToolNix MKVINFO v25.0.0 handles the MKV (matroska) file format. A specially crafted MKV file can cause arbitrary code execution in the context of the current user.

criterions.comment: mkvtoolnix package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
